name: Ladoga
hint: The largest lake in Europe, located in northwestern Russia near St. Petersburg

name: Onega
hint: The second-largest lake in Europe, located in northwestern Russia in Karelia

name: Vanern
hint: The largest lake in Sweden and the third-largest in Europe

name: Saimaa
hint: The largest lake in Finland, famous for the endangered Saimaa ringed seal

name: Lake Geneva
hint: A crescent-shaped lake on the border of Switzerland and France, one of Europe's largest Alpine lakes

name: Lake Constance
hint: A lake on the Rhine at the northern foot of the Alps, bordering Germany, Austria, and Switzerland

name: Balaton
hint: The largest lake in Central Europe, known as the Hungarian Sea

name: Lago di Garda
hint: The largest lake in Italy, located in the northern part of the country between Milan and Venice
